description.name: bKash
description.tagline: Accept bKash payments offline on WHMCS providing Make Payment or Send Money instructions.
description.long: While setting up the module, enter your personal or merchant bKash number. Include clear `Make Payment` instructions for bKash merchant or `Send Money` for bKash personal. You must manually add the bKash transaction to the invoice.
features: Can be used for bKash personal and merchant
